solution_line_template: Since there are {total_units} units, the number of units occupied by tenants is {occupied_numerator}/{occupied_denominator} * {total_units} = <<{occupied_numerator}/{occupied_denominator}*{total_units}={occupied_units}>>{occupied_units}

If each tenant pays ${rent_per_unit_per_month} every month, Mr Maximilian receives {occupied_units} * ${rent_per_unit_per_month} = $<<{occupied_units}*{rent_per_unit_per_month}={monthly_revenue}>>{monthly_revenue} in rent revenue every month.
In a year, Mr Maximilian receives ${monthly_revenue} * {months_per_year} = $<<{monthly_revenue}*{months_per_year}={annual_revenue}>>{annual_revenue} in rent revenue.
